```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::knit_hooks$set(inline = function(x) { knitr:::format_sci(x, 'md')})
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r bioturbation_hist, include=TRUE, message=FALSE}
Bioturb_data= read_xlsx('Drive_data.xls')
png('avg_bioturb_hist.png')
avg_bioturb_hist<-hist(Bioturb_data$`Average %`,
  main="Average Percent of Bioturbation",
  xlab="Percent Bioturbation (mm)",
  border="black",
  col="light blue",
  breaks=4
)
dev.off()
print(avg_bioturb_hist)

```
